whisky.name_display: Netherfield Speyside Single Malt Scotch Whisky (Linkwood) 10 Years Old

tasting.summary: A smoothly drinking dram with bright citrus and fruit notes.

source.original_text:
#MyWeekendDram Through RBrand Design I met Radmila Istomina and her husband Roman, owners of Netherfield.

It is a fantastic little company based in Strathaven, South Lanarkshire. Netherfield are building their own distillery, but while they wait they slowly release small batches of exceptional whiskies that they have come across during their travels.

On Friday night I treated myself to their 10 year old Speyside Linkwood. A beautifully smooth dram, with notes of lemony zest and sour plooms. Whilst the prawn curry was cooking, I may have helped myself to another.
